scripts.invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name OpenWeatherAPIFunction --region us-east-1 --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template ./cloudformation.yaml --s3-bucket openweatherapibucket --output-template packaged-sam.yaml --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yaml --stack-name OpenWeatherAPIStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.package-deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket openweatherapibucket --region us-east-1 || npm run create-bucket) && npm run package-deploy
scripts.win-invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --function-name OpenWeatherAPIFunction --region us-east-1 --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.win-package: aws cloudformation package --template ./cloudformation.yaml --s3-bucket openweatherapibucket --output-template packaged-sam.yaml --region us-east-1
scripts.win-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yaml --stack-name OpenWeatherAPIStack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-east-1
scripts.win-package-deploy: npm run win-package && npm run win-deploy
scripts.win-setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --bucket openweatherapibucket --region us-east-1 || npm run win-create-bucket) && npm run win-package-deploy
